headline: What Does Fiserv’s 70% Drop Mean for Its True Value in 2025?
summary: Wondering if Fiserv stock is trading at a bargain or is just cheap for a reason? You are not alone. The value story here is sparking plenty of debate. The stock has seen a steep drop lately, falling 4.5% over the past week and losing nearly 70% in value so far this year. This dramatic shift has put it squarely on value investors’ radars. Recent headlines about major fintech mergers and ongoing digital payments competition have put Fiserv under the spotlight, fueling fresh speculation about...
